code: export var subTotal=function subTotal(id,price){var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));var subTotalCost=carts.filter(function(items){return items.id===id;}).reduce(function(total,item){return total+item.quantitiy*price;},0);return subTotalCost;};export var quantity=function quantity(id){var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));var product=carts.filter(function(items){return items.id===id;}).map(function(item){return item.quantitiy;});return product;};export var totalCost=function totalCost(){var carts=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));var totalCost=carts.reduce(function(total,items){return total+items.quantitiy*items.price;},0);return totalCost;};
